thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Lannett Co Reports Q2 Earnings Per Share $0.37

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Lannett Co Reports Q2 Earnings Per Share $0.37
text:
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Lannett Company Inc:
* LANNETT ANNOUNCES FISCAL 2018 SECOND-QUARTER FINANCIAL RESULTS; REPORTS RECORD REVENUES, STRONG EARNINGS
* Q2 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.06 * Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.37 * Q2 SALES $184.3 MILLION VERSUS $170.9 MILLION * ‍SEES FISCAL 2018 CAPITAL EXPENDITURES $45 MILLION TO $55 MILLION​
* SEES ‍NET SALES $680 MILLION TO $700 MILLION​ FOR 2018 * SEES 2018 NON-GAAP NET SALES $680 MILLION TO $700 MILLION
* Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.85, REVENUE VIEW $191.8 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 REVENUE VIEW $720.9 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
